item.title: Gnome Gliders
item.dc:creator: @ninja_richi ninja richi
item.description:
@ninja_richi wrote:

I added gnome gliders too my server, that when you talk to the gnome glider you get the interface then when you click one of them it takes you to a place. but i can’t seem to get the interface to show up when u talk to the gnome. Heres what i’ve added.

[code]case 3056:
teleportToX = 2592;
teleportToY = 3415;
sendMessage(“You Glide To The Fishing Area”);
closeInterface();
break;

case 3057:
teleportToX = 3300;
teleportToY = 3483;
sendMessage(“You Glide To The Woodcutting Area”);
closeInterface();
break;

case 3058:
teleportToX = 3358;
teleportToY = 3408;
sendMessage(“You Glide To The Thieving Area”);
closeInterface();
break;

case 3059:
teleportToX = 2605;
teleportToY = 4776;
sendMessage(“You Glide To The Farming Area”);
closeInterface();
break;

case 3060:
teleportToX = 2333;
teleportToY = 9868;
sendMessage(“You Glide To The Slayer Area”);
closeInterface();
break;

case 48054:
teleportToX = 3002;
teleportToY = 3931;
sendMessage(“You Glide To The Agility Area”);
closeInterface();break;[/code]

else if (NPCID == 170) { // Gnome Pilot PutNPCCoords = true; sendMessage("Where would you like to go."); sendFrame248(802,5063); //Gnome glider interface }

spawn = 170	2593	5409	0	0000	0000	0000	0000	1	Gnome pilot

Anyone know how to get him to show you the interface when talked to?

Read full topic
